name: Harry Loses It
description:
Harry is sent to the store to buy groceries but gets lost along with all his things.

This game was made in a few hours for the "I Can't Write But Want To Tell A Story" jam. The theme was lost. Since I had already created a character that makes people lose things, it was perfect!

Since so many people liked Dentist Days, I decided to use similar elements to make this.

Magic Mandy coming soon!
